org.dblp.mmdb

Class Mmdb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.Mmdb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MmdbInterface

    public class Mmdb
extends java.lang.Object
implements MmdbInterface
    This class builds a simple main memory data structure for the dblp records. A MMDB object may contain the complete dblp collection or a subset of it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MmdbInterface EMTPY_MMDB
      An empty MMDB.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp records from the input stream.

      Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp file.

      Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp file.

    • Field Detail

      • EMTPY_MMDB

        public static final MmdbInterface EMTPY_MMDB
        An empty MMDB. Used mainly for testing code without building an actual Mmdb.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.io.InputStream xmlInputStream,
            java.io.InputStream dtdInputStream,
            boolean verbose)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp records from the input stream.
        Parameters:
        xmlInputStream - The dblp XML records to be loaded into the main memory database.
        dtdInputStream - The content of the dblp.dtd. If set to null, the dblp.dtd file needs to be available in the classpath.
        verbose - If true, progress and timing information is logged to stderr.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur while parsing the XML stream.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur while parsing the XML stream.

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.io.InputStream xmlInputStream,
            boolean verbose)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp records from the input stream. The dblp.dtd file needs to be available in the classpath.
        Parameters:
        xmlInputStream - The dblp XML records to be loaded into the main memory database.
        verbose - If true, progress and timing information is logged to stderr.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur while parsing the XML stream.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur while parsing the XML stream.

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.lang.String xmlFilename,
            java.lang.String dtdFilename,
            boolean verbose)
     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
            java.io.FileNotFoundException,
            java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp file.
        Parameters:
        xmlFilename - The dblp XML file to be loaded into the main memory database, the file may be compressed (.gz).
        dtdFilename - The dblp.dtd file.
        verbose - If true, progress and timing information is logged to stderr.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if a file is given as null.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if a given file cannot be opened for reading.
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur while parsing the XML.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur while parsing the XML.

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.lang.String xmlFilename,
            boolean verbose)
     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
            java.io.FileNotFoundException,
            java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the given dblp file. The dblp.dtd file needs to be available in the classpath.
        Parameters:
        xmlFilename - The dblp XML file to be loaded into the main memory database, the file may be compressed (.gz).
        verbose - If true, progress and timing information is logged to stderr.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if xmlFilename == null.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if xmlFilename cannot be opened for reading.
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur while parsing the XML.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur while parsing the XML.
